items.sentence: I drove all the way to Boston just to give Tom a birthday gift.
I could tell you some things about Tom that might surprise you.
Tom can\'t say for sure how many times Mary has been to Boston.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary wanted to give the bottle of wine to.
Tom didn\'t leave a suicide note, so the police suspect murder.
I have to leave early today because I have to attend a funeral.
We all took for granted that the professor could speak English.
We have to use the stairs because the elevator is out of order.
We need another three million dollars to complete this project.
What textbook does Tom use when he teaches French to beginners?
When I have homework to do, my brother always helps me with it.
Tom pretended like he didn\'t know what Mary was talking about.
Tom hates to admit that he\'s a member of the older generation.
Tom couldn\'t shake the feeling that there was something wrong.
Tom did it this morning so he wouldn\'t have to do it tomorrow.
Tom didn\'t ask Mary who she was planning to go to Boston with.
Tom didn\'t feel like sitting for two hours in a movie theater.
Tom didn\'t find out he had been adopted until he was thirteen.
I can\'t help feeling that Tom hasn\'t told me the whole truth.
You aren\'t the only one who likes baseball. Tom likes it, too.
